alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 9:04AM MST until December 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, from Noon today to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow can significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be coldest Wednesday night through early Thursday afternoon.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
